body_html: I don't think we have an issue for that, but we're working on it. You can see that we've moved some code in configure to just modifying --action_env already. Once that's all it does, you don't have to run it any more. Still WIP.

body:
I don't think we have an issue for that, but we're working on it. You can
see that we've moved some code in configure to just modifying --action_env
already. Once that's all it does, you don't have to run it any more. Still
WIP.
